document_data.name: Sissa
document_data.mainbody: '''Sissa''' was an [[Ilmatari]] [[acolyte]] that maintained the [[Shrine of the Suffering]].
document_data.Personality: The residents of Baldur's Gate very much cherished Sissa, their sibling, and father, Brother [[Hodges]].
document_data.History: In [[1482 DR]], Sissa worked with her father in [[Baldur's Gate]]. During this time, neither Sissa nor Hanse were old enough to marry, but were in [[1492 DR]].
